articles.title: EU's health commissioner warns of 'twindemic' of Covid, seasonal flu - The Statesman
articles.description: The commissioner said up to 40,000 people in the European Union lose their lives each year due to influenza-related causes even without the pandemic.
articles.content: As winter comes, the circulation of viruses that cause Covid-19 and seasonal influenza could possibly trigger a “twindemic”, the European Commissioner for Health and Food Safety Stella Kyriakides war… [+1377 chars]
